long_description: These Surfboard Aero Pads from Thule let you haul your board safely. Pads are specifically designed to fit the Thule Rapid Aero bars, Xsporter and most factory racks. Works great transporting surfboards and stand-up paddle boards with the convenient bungee cinch-cord strap down. Rip-and-stick closure system makes bar installation and removal a breeze. 2 high density foam pads feature durable no-fade UV resistant fabric covers that will stand up to years of use. These 24 in. long Thule Surf Pads are designed to fit Thule Rapid Aero bars, Xsporter and most factory racks.
short_description: These Surfboard Aero Pads from Thule let you haul your board safely. Pads are specifically designed to fit the Thule Rapid Aero bars, Xsporter and most factory racks.
